div.head: 大小便閉
div.div: major and minor relief blocked; blocked defecation and urination

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major and minor relief blocked; blocked defecation and urination

sense.def: IS, Pathological Condition Combined Designation of xiao bian bi 小便閉 , blocked urination, and da bian bi 大便 閉 , blocked defecation. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 17: 大小便閉，小腹有氣結如斗大，脹滿 , “ Defecation and urination are blocked . There are bean-size qi nodes in the lower abdomen, with a feeling of distension and fullness”.
